decision_conditions: The applicant is reminded that the following conditions imposed by London Underground Ltd must be adhered to:
1) No building construction can take place within 2m of the London Underground boundary.

2) Ongoing communication with the LUL Infrastructure Protection team shall take place throughout the construction phase, including the additional review of designs, method statements and risk assessments deemed necessary by LU Infrastructure Protection including but not limited to:
- Tall Plant including cranes and piling rigs
3) Ongoing monitoring of the contiguous pile wall movement should be undertaken to verify predicted movements.
4) Careful site control by the project and design team to ensure that the construction sequence is followed with regular update reports to LUL Infrastructure Protection to verify this.
5) Any variation of the design or proposed construction sequence (where it may impact upon the TfL operational land) must be reviewed further and accepted
description: Details pursuant to Condition 13 (Groundworks) of planning ref:  26134/APP/2018/2743 for Section 73 application seeking Minor Material Amendment to revise Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission ref: 26134/APP1201611987, dated 5/7/17: Demolition of existing office building and re-development of the site to provide a 4 storey building with basement parking comprising 40 residential units with associated car parking, amenity space and landscaping, to allow replacement of car lift with access ramp, increase size of terrace over the ramp, relocate children's play area, relocation of 4 disabled spaces from surface level to basement, provision of 13 M4(2) compliant spaces with net reduction from 31 to 29 spaces, uplift of cycle space provision from 41 to 51 cycle spaces, increasing the size of the M4(3) units, additional service provision, including riser areas and plant room and car park ventilation and roof amendments to include additional PV panel provision and increase in gable eaves height by 75mm
